feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Cloud] - End of Life Dedicated Cloud
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 30, 12:00 UTC  -  Dec 20, 20:29 UTC

Jul 25, 13:27 UTC
Scheduled - End of Life Dedicated Cloud: 30 September 2022
We informed you in October 2021 that our Dedicad Cloud service will reach its end of life and will be discontinued the 30st September 2022. This step is important for your VMware platforms to improve the quality of service, performance, and security of your clusters. Indeed, "Dedicated Cloud" hardware used, pre-2016, does not allow us to provide the best level of service and integration with new modern architectures of VMware.
Following our previous email, many customers started to plan and/or to migrate and we encourage you to do the same to avoid the September deadline.

Guide to migrating to a new infrastructure:
https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/private-cloud/vdc-migration/

entry.title: [EU/CA/SNC][NETWORK] OvhVeeamServers
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 16, 06:00 UTC  -  Aug 25, 04:00 UTC

Aug 5, 22:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/08/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 25/08/2922 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact in production expected
Service improvement : We need to remove OvhVeeamServers ressource pool so every OVH managed VM in the customer PCC will be in OvhServers ressource pool

Aug 1, 17:33 UTC
Scheduled - Start time: 11/08/2022 04:00 UTC
End time: 11/08/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact: A few seconds of Input/Output freeze when the service will do a switchover (2 times)

entry.title: [RBX2A-BHS1A][Dedicated Servers] - Veeam Cloud Connect operation
entry.content:
Aug 8, 12:45 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Aug 4, 12:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 3, 22:07 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/08/2022 12:00 UTC
End time : 10/08/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Veeam backup process launched by customers will be interrupted.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will update a Veeam Cloud Connect product in RBX2A and BHS1A.
Veeam backup process will be relaunched automatically by Veeam.

Investigating - Please note the incident on

OVHcloud Technical team

entry.title: [RBX2A] [VMware Private Cloud - Storage] - Tete-279
entry.content:
Aug 5, 03:33 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 05/08/2022 01:03 UTC
End time : 05/08/2022 03:32 UTC
Root cause : A service switch failed due to a hardware problem.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. The service is operational.

Aug 5, 01:25 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 05/08/2022 01:03 UTC
Service impact : pcc-001608 , pcc-001615 , pcc-004887
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Root cause : A service switch failed due to a hardware problem.
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Start time: 04/08/2022 03:33 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. Impacted services are now operational.

Aug 4, 01:17 UTC
Identified - Start time: 04/08/2022 00:41 UTC
User impact : Some zpool are not mounted on the gwssl, sftp access issue
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2A
Scope of impact : Gateway ssl
Root cause : Incident caused by operation on a maintenance about storage switchover.

entry.title: [RBX2A] [VMware Private Cloud - Storage] - Tete-132
entry.content:
Aug 3, 16:02 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 03/08/2022 15:20 UTC
End Time : 03/08/2022 15:46 UTC
Service impact :Pcc-000553, pcc-000556, pcc-000559 and pcc-002234 were unreachable. Services are working as they should be actually.
Root cause : A service switch failed due to a hardware problem.
